cards.title: Drink
cards.description: You must take a sip

cards.title: Make it double
cards.description: You must take 2 sips

cards.title: Another Round
cards.description: Everyone must take a sip.

cards.title: Clusterfuck
cards.description: Flip a coin. If you get heads, then each player takes 1 sip. On the other hand if you get tails you take a sip as many times as there are people in the room.

cards.title: Bros before hoes
cards.description: All female players must drink. If there are no female players, then boys take a shot

cards.title: Hair on your chest
cards.description: You must take a shot

cards.title: Topsy Turvy
cards.description: Hah! , good luck. Everyone touch your toes without bending your knees. Those who can't must take a sip.

cards.title: The confessional
cards.description: The person that has most recently had sex must drink. It was nice when you called me daddy yesterday.

cards.title: My life is so hard
cards.description: Whine about an ex, then drink. I know you want to.

cards.title: Macho Man
cards.description: You must select a player to arm-wrestle. Winner takes 1 sip and loser takes 4 sips.

cards.title: Chest to chest
cards.description: You must take 2 sips for each female player in the room. If there are no female players in the room, finish your drink.

cards.title: Winner winner cock dinner
cards.description: The last person to say, 'I love cock', must take a sip for each cock in the room.

cards.title: Peace Treaty
cards.description: Everyone looses in a war, tough some loose more. Everyone take 2 sips, but you totally lost the war, finish your glass or take a shot.

cards.title: Monkey Punch
cards.description: Monkee see, monkee do. Finish your glass. If someone doesn't have a drink,. the first player to finish can punch them in the arm.

cards.title: Wonder twins
cards.description: Choose another player to fist bump as you say, Wonder Twin Powers, Activate!. All other players take a sip, unless you are not in sync, then you must take 2 sips.

cards.title: Molotov Cocktail
cards.description: Oh, no! Looks like you dropped your molly, thankfully the C. S. G. O. gods are with you and it does not spread far. You must take 2 sips and the person to your left and right must take 1 sip.

cards.title: Molly out
cards.description: Ohh, no! Looks like you dropped your molly, the C. S. G. O. gods aren't with you now and it spreads far. You must drink 3 sips, each person next to you must take 2 sips and the person next to them 1.

cards.title: Deal with the devil
cards.description: You must take a shot. Now your soul is mine!, hehe hoho haha, but you can give any 2 players 5 sips and you can skip your next punishment.

cards.title: Musical Chairs
cards.description: Everyone must stand up and sit down in the seat to their right.

cards.title: Navy SEALS training
cards.description: A player of your choosing can't breathe, until they have taken 8 sips.

cards.title: Freaks
cards.description: The tallest and shortest players must toast to their freakish heights and take a sip.

cards.title: Shark bait
cards.description: All players with red hair, must take a sip, for the number of redheads in the room.

cards.title: Monkey Hair
cards.description: The hairiest player must take 2 sips.

cards.title: Nice cock
cards.description: You have a nice cock. Take 4 sips.

cards.title: The David Blaine
cards.description: Everyone must hold their breath. The first one to breathe has to take 3 sips.

cards.title: Designated driver
cards.description: Everyone who cannot show a valid driver's license must take a sip.

cards.title: Good samaritan
cards.description: Choose 1 player to give your phone to. That person must dial someone in your conctacts list, (preferably someone who wouldn't recognize them).\nIf the person answers: Tell them you found this phone and ask them if they know who owns it.

cards.title: Drunk Dial
cards.description: Choose 1 person that either currenlty is or recently has been in a relationship. They must call their partner or ex.\nDuring the call they should act really drunk, call the person on the phone mom or dad and ask them why the floor is upside down

cards.title: Good morning
cards.description: You must loudly moan with pleasure. Ohh. Yeah. Daddy. Harder! Ahh. Ahhhhh

cards.title: Metal detector
cards.description: Whoever has the most piercings must drink.

cards.title: Rock paper scissors
cards.description: Pick a player to play rock-paper-scissors with. Looser take 2 sips. For a tie everyone else must drink.

cards.title: Winter Olympics
cards.description: Choose a player. He must stand on one foot, and stick his arms out, while you pour his drink in his mouth. If you fail, you both have to take a shot.

cards.title: Blowjob
cards.description: Choose a player. He must give you a blowjob. Mmm. Yes. I like this. I am kidding, you must take a shot using only your mouth.

cards.title: Body shot
cards.description: You must select a player. That player must take a body-shot off you. If either player rejects you both take 2 shots.

cards.title: Sobriety test
cards.description: Whoop, Whoop! The police got you. Stick your arms out, stand on one foot, and close one eye. Stand like this for 15 seconds. If you fail you must take 2 sips. If you succeed everyone else takes 4 sips.

cards.title: Tornado
cards.description: Everyone stands up. You spin around once and drink once, the person to your left spins twice and drinks twice, and so on until it comes back to you.

cards.title: Easy Access
cards.description: Any player with their legs crossed must take a sip.

cards.title: Flunk the junk
cards.description: Any player that doesn't have their legs crossed must take a sip.

cards.title: Madness
cards.description: Everyone stand up and start shouting war cries. Finish your drinks, one at a time. When everyone has finished their drinks, everyone takes a shot. When each player has taken a shot, you may stop the war cries.

cards.title: Bottoms Up
cards.description: Pick a person, to guess the color of your underwear. If this color appears anywhere on your underwear, you take 2 sips.

cards.title: Fallen Soldier
cards.description: Choose a payer, he must take a shot and then fall off his chair.

cards.title: Piggyback
cards.description: Choose a player, until it's your turn again each time he drinks you drink as much as he.

cards.title: Zombie Jesus
cards.description: All players who belive in God must take a sip.

cards.title: Cheap alcohol
cards.description: The player with the least amount in his glass, must top it up with water.

cards.title: A Little Captain In You
cards.description: Everyone must quickly strike the Captain Morgan pose. Last one to captain must take a sip.

cards.title: The St. Bernard
cards.description: You must lie motionless on your back. Everyone else must walk on 4 feet and pour a drink into your mouth.

cards.title: Like a Pussy
cards.description: You must purr and lick your glass with each sip you take. If you forget to do that you must take another sip. This lasts for a whole round.

cards.title: The President
cards.description: In each turn for a whole round, select another player to take a sip.

cards.title: Beast of Burden
cards.description: You must drink double the normal amount for 2 rounds.

cards.title: Vengeance
cards.description: Select a player. Everytime he drinks everyone else drinks. This effect lasts for 2 rounds.

cards.title: Thumb War
cards.description: Select a player. Each time he has to drink, everyone else has to place their thumb on a flat surface. The last one to do so has to take a sip. Lasts 2 rounds.

cards.title: Disease
cards.description: You must take a sip when it's your turn for 3 rounds.

cards.title: Handicap
cards.description: For 2 rounds, everytime you have to drink or take a shot you only have to take 1 sip.

cards.title: Lefty
cards.description: You must play with your dominant hand behind your back for 2 rounds. If you use it, take a sip.

cards.title: Suicidal Serial Killer
cards.description: You must touch 3 players. These players take a shot and you take 2 shots.

cards.title: Cleaning lady
cards.description: You must take all empty containers, and put them in the trash.

cards.title: The Butler
cards.description: Everyone with less than half a glass must finish their drink, say 'ding ding' and you should give them a new drink.

cards.title: Slave
cards.description: Choose a player. Each time you have to drink you can tell that player to drink instead.

cards.title: Superhero
cards.description: For a whole round, you have to strike a superhero pose and command the player, that has to drink, to drink.

cards.title: Der Fuhrer
cards.description: For a whole round you must talk like Hitler, and everyone must sieg heil each time they drink.

cards.title: Crybaby
cards.description: You must start crying and take 2 sips.

cards.title: Baywatch
cards.description: You must move, talk, and, drink in slow motion.

cards.title: OMG OMG OMG OMG
cards.description: You must act very excited about everything for 3 rounds.

cards.title: What is that
cards.description: If you can get 1 player to look at the ceiling he must take a sip.

cards.title: Senor Arriba
cards.description: Select 2 players. They must both take 3 sips and then high-five.

cards.title: Dr. Shots-a-Lot
cards.description: You choose a nickname for yourself. Anyone who refers to you by your real name has to take a sip. Lasts for 2 rounds.

cards.title: Waterfall
cards.description: You know what this is! I trust you to start.

cards.title: Question Master
cards.description: Try to get someone to answer a question, if you are successful the victim has to take 3 sips.

cards.title: Yo Momma
cards.description: You should tell as many yo, mama, jokes as you can for the next 2 rounds.

cards.title: Oath
cards.description: You may not speak to anyone for 2 rounds.

cards.title: CAPS LOCK
cards.description: YOU MUST SHOUT EVERYTHING FOR 2 ROUNDS

cards.title: Pride Parade
cards.description: You must act, and talk, as gay as possible for 1 round.

cards.title: Master Race
cards.description: All blonde players must take a sip. Blue-eyed players must take a sip. Oh! and if you are both then take 5 sips.

cards.title: It's not lupus
cards.description: Go around in a circle and name diseases. First player to fail must take 2 sips. If you name COVID-19 take a shot.

cards.title: Don't Tails Me Bro
cards.description: You  must flip a coin until you get two heads in a row. For each tails you take a sip.

cards.title: Ministry of Silly Walks
cards.description: Selected player must walk around in a silly manner. Everyone else takes a sip.

cards.title: The Mature Argument
cards.description: For a whole round everyone must mock you. They must immitade your speech and actions in an exaggerated manner.

cards.title: Cup size
cards.description: You must drink from the largest cup or container available.

cards.title: Nic Fury
cards.description: Everyone who has used nicotine in the past 3 months must take 2 sips. If anyone is currently using nicotine he or she has to take 5 sips.

cards.title: Prarie Oyster
cards.description: All of the other players must create a shot with 1 unusual ingredient and you must drink it. You can't know the ingredient, if you guesses the ingredient all the other playrs must take a shot.

cards.title: The Enabler
cards.description: Last player to get their pants around their ankles must take 2 sips.

cards.title: Araccuracy
cards.description: You have 10 seconds to draw a spider with a smiley face. You must draw the correct amount of legs. If you succeed everyone must take a sip, if not, you take a sip for each player.

cards.title: Charging My Lazer
cards.description: You must get a new empty glass. Each time you have to drink you pour that amount into the new glass and after 2 rounds you chugg that shit.

cards.title: Enjoy Your Hand
cards.description: All single players must take a sip.

cards.title: Come to Daddy
cards.description: Youngest player must sit on the oldest players lap for 1 round.

cards.title: Cold in here
cards.description: You must choose 3 players that should fetch 1 icecube each and place them under your clothes.

cards.title: Baby Got Back
cards.description: Everyone must spank you.

cards.title: Stare of Death
cards.description: Select a player to compete in a staring contest. The loser takes 2 sips.

cards.title: The Sundial
cards.description: You must go outside, and run 10 circles, then take a sip.

cards.title: Tongue Tied
cards.description: You must recite a tongue twister in your native language. If you mess up you must drink twice.

cards.title: Watering Hole
cards.description: Somebody has to pour a drink into your hands. You must then drink it. If you spill any you must finish your drink.

cards.title: Wall-E
cards.description: You must make out with or hump, a poster, object, or wall, for at least 15 seconds.

cards.title: 4 eyes
cards.description: Everyone with glasses must take a sip for each plus or minus they have on each eye. Those wearing contacts drink double that. Don't try to hide your eyeball failure.

cards.title: Drunken Sailor
cards.description: You must swear like a mother-fucking cock-ass son of a goddamn bitch. Cunting shit-piss ball sniffer, fucking shit-piss; fuck you. Shit piss fuck cunt cock-sucker motherfucker and tits. Fart turd twat asshole god damn it son of a bitch.

cards.title: Piss Warrior
cards.description: The last player who went to the bathroom must drink half of their glass.

cards.title: The Stiff Upper Lip
cards.description: You must balance a coin on your nose for a whole round. Everytime you drop it, you must take a sip.

cards.title: Fuck! He does.
cards.description: At anytime you may say 'Fuzzy duck, ducky fuzz' . The last player to repeat it or fails to say it correctly must take a sip. You may only use this once.

cards.title: Dancer In the Dark
cards.description: You and some other player must dance sensually and slowly to any song.

cards.title: Jiggle Circus
cards.description: Everyone listen up. Say 'BOOBS'. The player who said it last must take a sip. For every fake tits in the room his sips are doubled.

cards.title: Aw Nuts
cards.description: You must take 1 sip for each testicle in the room.

cards.title: You're my man now
cards.description: Whoever's birthday is soonest must take a sip for each remaining month. If it's someone's birthday, they take a shot.

cards.title: Tickle Me Elmo
cards.description: Eveyone in dark clothes must sob pathetically and take 2 sips.

cards.title: Hey Mom!
cards.description: This one is for everyone. If anyone has walked in on you while doing any sexual act, take a sip.

cards.title: Globetrotters
cards.description: Every player takes a sip for each continent they've been to. If they've been to more than 6 they must take a shot.

cards.title: Mister uh..
cards.description: You may not call anyone by their real name for 3 rounds. For each time you screw up you take a sip.

cards.title: Golden Tongue
cards.description: Each plyer must take a sip for every language they speak. If anyone only knows 1 language they take a shot.

cards.title: Rim Job
cards.description: Choose a player to toss small candy into a glass 2 meters away. If they make it everyone take a sip. If they miss they must take a sip for each player.

cards.title: Guilty Pleasures
cards.description: Each player must take a sip for everytime they masturbated in the last week, if they've had sex they also take a shot for each time they've had sex in the last week.

cards.title: Gold Digga
cards.description: Anyone with more than 15 euros in their wallet must drink, facilitating the Proletatiat Revolution.

cards.title: Sucker
cards.description: You must drink with a straw for the next 3 rounds. If you can't find one take a shot.

cards.title: Foreign Revenge
cards.description: Everyone except foreigners must take a sip.

cards.title: The Gimp
cards.description: You may not talk at all for the next 2 rounds. You may only gesture and give out muffled grunting sounds.

cards.title: Elephant in the Room
cards.description: If anyone at the table has fucked anyone else at the table, they must both take 2 sips as they look each other in the eye.

cards.title: Psychonaut
cards.description: The player who has done the most recreational drugs must take 2 sips. They probably won't mind. Dude, pass me the blunt!

cards.title: Coming Prepared
cards.description: Anyone who can't present a condom must drink. Anyone with a used condom may select an extra player to drink.

cards.title: Toy Story
cards.description: Any player who has used any sort of toy, sexually, must take a sip.

cards.title: Stand-Up Obedient
cards.description: You must tell a joke. If anyone laughs, everyone except you takes a sip. If you fail to get anyone to laugh you take a shot.
